shortContent:
When rolling for Psychic
Phenomenon, the character may discard the die roll, gaining
1d5 Corruption Points, and then re-roll with no modifiers.
content:
The character has a special connection to the warp, allowing
him to sense and avoid its less desirable effects as he channels
its power. The character may not select this Talent if he has
undergone the Rite of Sanctioning. When rolling for Psychic
Phenomenon, the character may discard the die roll, gaining
1d5 Corruption Points, and then re-roll with no modifiers.
extraSubCategories: Psy Rating. May not have Rite of Sanctioning.
